com.paypal.android.sdk.payments
Class PaymentConfirmation

java.lang.Object
  com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PaymentConfirmation

public class PaymentConfirmation
extends Object

Provides all information needed to confirm & verify the payment.

Because your app is running on a device outside your control it is possible that someone could tamper with the data sent to PayPal or to your own server. Therefore, you must send this object to your server, which must then verify the details with PayPal's servers.

This object is provided to easily serialize the confirmaiton to JSON.

See more details about verifying a mobile payment.

getEnvironment

public String getEnvironment()
Returns:
The value of PaymentActivity.EXTRA_PAYPAL_ENVIRONMENT used to create the payment.

getPayment

public PayPalPayment getPayment()
Returns:
The confirmed payment.

getProofOfPayment

public ProofOfPayment getProofOfPayment()
Returns:
A ProofOfRestPayment for a credit card payment, or a ProofOfAdaptivePayment for a PayPal payment. (future releases will generate Rest payments for all transaction types.)

toJSONObject

public JSONObject toJSONObject()
Returns:
The JSON object to send to your server.
